tool_description: An API showing live data on all the latest Climate Change News around the world
name: World Climate Change News Live
title: World Climate Change News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Climate Change News
api_list.description: An endpoint that gets news about climate change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-change-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-change-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the news about Climate Change from all around the world
